item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: May 17, 2023 Today's Verse 2 Corinthians 9:7 [7] Each one must give as he has decided in his heart, not reluctantly or under compulsion, for God loves a cheerful giver. Today's Memory Verse 1 John 4:7-8 - Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God. 8 Anyone who does not love does not know God, because God is love.
